page.title: 20The Auckland Homes
page.content: The{Auckland Homes}are situated along the western boundary of{Wearside {College.}Built during the latter part of World War II with money sent over by the{New Zealand Government,}they first served as temporary homes for bombed out people. When these people were all re-housed they were given over to{elderly {retired folk.}In the centre of the terrace is a communal building where the inhabitants can meet to play dominoes, cards etc. and where meals can be brought to the at low cost. It is run by the{Social Services}who have installed alarm systems to all the houses. Each system is connected to the warden should any of the elderly require assistance.
